title: Get Transactions by Statement
content:
# Path: /finance/202501/statements/{statement_id}/statement_transactions
# Method: [GET]
# Function Description
Retrieves the details of a statement, including the transactions, which can be a standard order transaction, an adjustment transaction, or a reserve-related transaction. For the SKU-level details of an order transaction, refer to [Get Transactions by Order](650a6734defece02be67d724).
Applicable for all regions' sellers. Only data after 2023-07-01 is available (Please note that for US cross-border sellers, data before 2025-04-30 is unavailable).

---


# Common Parameters
For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%20To%20Top)
| Properties <!-- width:110px --> | Location <!-- width:75px --> | Type <!-- width:75px --> | Require <!-- width:60px --> | Sample <!-- width:254px --> | Properties description <!-- width:254px --> |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| shop_cipher | query | string | Y | GCP_XF90igAAAABh00qsWgtvOiGFNqyubMt3 | Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. |
| Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9) |  |  |  |  |  |
| content-type | header | string | Y | application/json | Allowed type: application/json |
# Request Path Parameters
| Properties <!-- width:110px --> | Type <!-- width:90px --> | Require <!-- width:90px --> | Sample <!-- width:254px --> | Properties description <!-- width:254px --> |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| statement_id | string | Y | 7238804564097517339 | The unique id of statement |
# Request Query Parameters
| Properties <!-- width:110px --> | Type <!-- width:90px --> | Require <!-- width:90px --> | Sample <!-- width:254px --> | Properties description <!-- width:254px --> |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| app_key | string | Y | 38abcd | Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app. |
| page_token | string | N | 6AsPQsUMvH3RkchNUPPh22NROHkE0D8pmq/N5M1kHYcZmtRyv9aVrNv65W7Q6tFA+7D1ud64MPNz5OaT | An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Retrieve this value from the result of the `next_page_token` from a previous response. It is not needed for the first page. |
| sort_field | string | Y | order_create_time | The returned results will be sorted by the specified field. Only supports `order_create_time`. |
| sort_order | string | N | DESC | The sort order for the `sort_field` parameter. |
| Default: ASC |  |  |  |  |
| Possible values: |  |  |  |  |

* ASC: Ascending order
* DESC: Descending order |
   page_size |int |N |20 |The number of results to be returned per page.
   Default: 20
   Valid range: [1-100] |
   sign |string |Y |5361235029d141222525e303d742f9e38aea052d10896d3197ab9d6233730b8c |Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders. |
   timestamp |int |Y |1623812664 |Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time. |

# Request Sample
**Query**
```Plain Text
https://open-api.tiktokglobalshop.com/finance/202501/statements/7238804564097517339/statement_transactions?app_key=123abc&sign=5361235029d141222525e303d742f9e38aea052d10896d3197ab9d6233730b8c&timestamp=1625484268&shop_cipher=ROW_RHkDDABBAAB8tKAVoAqsMTjsQZFLyNfY&page_token=6AsPQsUMvH3RkchNUPPh22NROHkE0D8pmq/N5M1kHYcZmtRyv9aVrNv65W7Q6tFA+7D1ud64MPNz5OaT&sort_field=order_create_time&sort_order=DESC&page_size=20
```

# Response Parameters
| Properties <!-- width:110px --> | Type <!-- width:90px --> | Sample <!-- width:289px --> | Properties description <!-- width:289px --> |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| code | int | 0 | The success or failure status code returned in API response. |
| message | string | Success | The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message. |
| request_id | string | 202203070749000101890810281E8C70B7 | Request log |
| data | object |  | Specific return information |
| ^next_page_token | string | 6AsPQsUMvH3RkchNUPPh22NROHkE0D8pmq/N5M1kHYcZmtRyv9aVrNv65W7Q6tFA+7D1ud64MPNz5OaT | An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Provide this value in the `page_token` parameter of your request if the current response does not return all the results. |
| ^id | string | 7238804564097517339 | The statement ID. |
| ^create_time | int | 1685548800 | The time when the statement was generated. Unix timestamp. |
| Statements are generated daily at 00:00 UTC. |  |  |  |
|  |  |  |  |
| ^status | string | SETTLED | The statement status. Only supports `SETTLED`. |
| ^currency | string | GBP | The three-digit currency code in ISO 4217 format. |
| ^payable_amount | string | 150 | The final amount paid out after accounting for reserve funds. |
| Formula: total_settlement_amount + total_reserve_amount |  |  |  |
| ^total_reserve_amount | string | 20 | The total amount withheld from settlement based on TikTok Shop Reserve Policy. Refer to TikTok Shop Academy for more information. |

* A positive amount indicates the funds that have been released.
* A negative amount indicates the funds being withheld from the settlement.

Applicable only for UK and US local sellers. |
^total_settlement_amount |string |130 |The total settlement amount.
Formula: total_revenue_amount - total_shipping_cost_amount - total_fee_tax_amount - total_adjustment_amount |
^total_settlement_breakdown |object | |The list of amounts that directly contribute to `total_settlement_amount`. |
^^total_revenue_amount |string |100 |The total revenue amount at the time of order settlement. This is equivalent to the net sales amount. |
^^total_shipping_cost_amount |string |120 |The total shipping costs at the time of order settlement. |
^^total_fee_tax_amount |string |20 |The total fees and taxes charged by the platform at the time of order settlement. Shipping-related costs are excluded. |
^^total_adjustment_amount |string |0 |The total adjustment amount based on TikTok Shop policy.
Refer to `transactions.type` for the list of adjustment-related policies. |
^total_count |int |2 |The number of transaction records in the statement. |
^transactions |[]object | |The list of transaction records in the statement. Each transaction corresponds to an order, an adjustment, or a reserve-related transaction. |
^^id |string |1636700041413599290 |The transaction ID. |
^^type |string |ORDER |The transaction type.
**Standard transactions**

* `ORDER`: A transaction related to an order settlement.
* `RESERVE`: A transaction involving collection or release of reserve funds.
* If the transaction is an adjustment, it returns one of the following values:

**Platform-related adjustments**

* `CHARGE_BACK`: Charges returned to a payment card after a customer has successfully disputed an item on their account statement or transactions report.
* `CUSTOMER_SERVICE_COMPENSATION`: Extra compensation or compensation paid to a customer after the after-sales period by customer service.
* `DEDUCTIONS_INCURRED_BY_SELLER`: Deduction arising from customer dissatisfaction as a result of the seller's responsibility. This includes issues such as fraud, empty packages, items that do not match the product display page, or items of lower value than advertised.
* `GMV_PAYMENT_FOR_ADS`: Amount used to pay for your advertisement if you are enabled "auto pay ads with shop GMV", or to pay for Tiktok Promote ads orders.
* `PLATFORM_COMMISSION_ADJUSTMENT`: Adjustment when there are differences in the platform commission paid by the seller.
* `PLATFORM_COMMISSION_COMPENSATION`: Compensation paid to the seller when there are differences in the platform commission paid by the seller.
* `PLATFORM_PENALTY`: Penalty imposed for a violation of TikTok Shop policies (the corresponding amount has been deducted from the seller's account). For details, please refer to the email notification sent to the seller.
* `PROMOTION_ADJUSTMENT`: Adjustment when a seller takes part in a platform promotion and there are differences between the promotion price and the actual amount paid by the seller.
* `REBATE`: A discount on referral fees offered by TikTok Shop to eligible sellers.
* `PLATFORM_COMPENSATION`: Compensation paid to the seller after the seller successfully appealed for a customer dispute.
* `PLATFORM_REIMBURSEMENT`: Reimbursement paid by TikTok Shop for an order refunded under TikTok's refund without return policy (the seller is not responsible).
* `COFUNDED_CREATOR_REWARDS`: Fees charged for joining the co-funded creator rewards program to reward creator activities.

**Logistics-related adjustments**

* `FBT_WAREHOUSE_SERVICE_FEE`: Amount charged by TikTok Fulfillment Portal (Pipak) for warehousing-related bills incurred by the seller under the Fulfilled by TikTok (FBT) service.
* `LOGISTICS_REIMBURSEMENT`: Reimbursement paid by TikTok Shop for an order refunded due to logistics-related issues (e.g. lost or damaged order).
* `SHIPPING_FEE_ADJUSTMENT`: Adjustment when there are differences or mistakes with the shipping fee paid by the seller.
* `SHIPPING_FEE_COMPENSATION`: Compensation given to sellers due to differences between the actual shipping fee and the pre-paid shipping fee.
* `SHIPPING_FEE_REBATE`: Shipping fee rebate provided to the seller as part of their participation in a platform campaign.
* `SAMPLE_SHIPPING_FEE`: Fees charged for sending samples using the TikTok logistics provider.
* `SELLER_MISSION_REWARD`: Platform provided cash reward for seller mission completion.
* `Violation fee （settlement fee）`: The deduction to cover the cost of buyer's losses for the unpleasant experience of the buyer due to an issue that is the seller's responsibility.
* `Violation fee （credit card）`: The amount owed to TikTok Shop from previous transactions, charged to your primary credit card.
* `Bill payment （negative balance）`: The amount you owe TikTok Shop, charged to your primary credit card.
* `Sales proceed（negative balance）`:Sales proceed that is ready to pay for negeative balance.
* `Bill deduction for negative balance`:Deduction for the amount you owe TikTok Shop after all platform fees are deducted from your net earnings.

**Miscellaneous adjustments**
`OTHER_ADJUSTMENT`: Adjustment for other reasons. |
^^order_id |string |576463220456522968 |The order ID.
Each transaction can only be associated with an order ID or an adjustment ID. |
^^order_create_time |int |1685548800 |The creation time of the order. Unix timestamp. |
^^adjustment_id |string |7238804564097517332 |The adjustment ID if the transaction is an adjustment.
Each transaction can only be associated with an order ID or an adjustment ID. |
^^adjustment_order_id |string |576463220456522968 |The order ID associated with the adjustment, if any. |
^^adjustment_amount |string |170 |The adjustment amount based on TikTok Shop policy.
Refer to `transactions.type` for the list of adjustment-related policies. |
^^settlement_amount |string |130 |The settlement amount for the order.
Formula: revenue_amount - shipping_cost_amount - fee_tax_amount - adjustment_amount |
^^revenue_amount |string |200 |The revenue amount at the time of order settlement. This is equivalent to the sum of all amounts in `revenue_breakdown`. |
^^revenue_breakdown |object | |The list of amounts that directly contribute to `revenue_amount`. |
^^^subtotal_before_discount_amount |string |30 |The total price of all order items before any seller discounts and platform discounts are deducted. This is equivalent to the shop's gross sales. |
^^^refund_subtotal_before_discount_amount |string |-20 |The total price of all refunded items before any seller discounts. This is equivalent to the shop's gross sales refund. |
^^^seller_discount_amount |string |10 |The total amount of discounts funded by the seller, including:

* Seller promotions (Product Discount, Flash Deal, Buy More Save More, Voucher and Bundle Deal)
* Seller's portion of a co-funded voucher discount in co-funding campaigns
* Seller discounts during a campaign |
   ^^^seller_discount_refund_amount |string |12 |Discounts returned to the sellers due to returns or refunds. |
   ^^^cod_service_fee_amount |string |10 |The cash on delivery service fees charged to buyers.
   Applicable only for Saudi Arabia. |
   ^^^refund_cod_service_fee_amount |string |-10 |The refund for cash on delivery service fees.
   Applicable only for Saudi Arabia. |
   ^^shipping_cost_amount |string |-70 |The shipping costs at the time of order settlement. This is equivalent to the sum of all contributory amounts in `shipping_cost_breakdown`. |
   ^^shipping_cost_breakdown |object | |The list of amounts that directly contribute to `shipping_cost_amount`. |
   ^^^actual_shipping_fee_amount |string |0 |The actual shipping fee calculated based on the weight/dimensions measured by the carrier. For details, check `shipping_cost_breakdown.supplementary_component`. |
   ^^^shipping_fee_discount_amount |string |0 |The shipping fee subsidies and incentives provided by the platform. This includes all subsidies regardless of fulfillment channels or policies. For details, check `shipping_cost_breakdown.supplementary_component`. |
   ^^^customer_paid_shipping_fee_amount |string |-10 |The actual shipping fee borne by the customer, calculated based on the product weight uploaded by the seller. Negative numbers refer to the refunded amount of customer-paid shipping fees |
   ^^^return_shipping_fee_amount |string |-10 |The shipping fee paid by the seller for the delivery of returns. |
   ^^^replacement_shipping_fee_amount |string |12 |The shipping fee paid by the seller for the delivery of goods replacement.

Applicable only for Indonesia. |
^^^exchange_shipping_fee_amount |string |0 |The shipping fee paid by the seller for the delivery of goods exchange.
Applicable only for Indonesia. |
^^^signature_confirmation_fee_amount |string |10 |The fee incurred for packages requiring signature confirmation services. |
^^^shipping_insurance_fee_amount |string |-10 |The shipping insurance fee incurred by the seller for purchasing additional TikTok shipping insurance services. |
^^^fbt_fulfillment_fee_reimbursement_amount |string |5 |A reimbursement from TikTok Shop for Fulfilled by TikTok (FBT) orders that don't qualify for free shipping.
Applicable only for the US. |
^^^return_shipping_label_fee_amount |string |5 |The fee borne by the customer to cover the cost of return labels. This fee is collected on the seller's behalf and settled according to the agreed payment terms. |
^^^seller_self_shipping_service_fee_amount |string |5 |A service fee charged for orders shipped through your own logistics provider. Applies to packages that don't meet the exemption criteria. |
^^^return_shipping_fee_paid_buyer_amount |string |5 |Reimbursement for the shipping fees paid by customers to return packages |
^^^failed_delivery_subsidy_amount |string |5 |For shipping fee from failed deliveries, you pay up to a standard rate, and TikTok Shop covers the remaining amount. |
^^^shipping_fee_guarantee_reimbursement |string |0 |Reimbursement from the Shipping Fee Guarantee Program for failed deliveries or returns |
^^^fbt_free_shipping_fee_amount |string |0 |This is the fee that you cover when offering customers free shipping through FBT. |
^^^free_return_subsidy_amount |string |0 |Reimbursement for the platform-funded portion of return shipping fees, as part of the free returns offered to customers. |
^^^supplementary_component |object | |Supplementary costs for your reference. These amounts do not directly contribute to `shipping_cost_amount`. |
^^^^platform_shipping_fee_discount_amount |string |-10 |The shipping fee discount provided in accordance with a campaign policy. This is part of `shipping_fee_discount_amount`. |
^^^^promo_shipping_incentive_amount |string |-5 |The additional shipping incentive that the seller will receive if the seller signed up for the Co-Funded Free Shipping Program. A negative amount indicates a reversal of incentives due to order refunds attributed to the seller's responsibility. This is part of `shipping_fee_discount_amount`. |
^^^^shipping_fee_subsidy_amount |string |5 |The shipping fee subsidy funded by the platform for seller shipping. This is part of `shipping_fee_discount_amount`.

* Positive amount represents a subsidy received by the seller.
* Negative amount represents a subsidy that the seller must return to TikTok Shop. |
   ^^^^seller_shipping_fee_discount_amount |string |4 |The shipping fee discount provided by sellers. |
   ^^^^customer_shipping_fee_offset_amount |string |23 |The fee to offset TikTok Shop Shipping Incentive or customer-paid shipping fee, resulting in a net charge of $0 to the seller.

Applicable only for the US. |
^^^^fbm_shipping_cost_amount |string |20 |The shipping fee incurred by the seller for using TikTok Shipping. This is part of `actual_shipping_fee_amount`. |
^^^^fbt_shipping_cost_amount |string |30 |The shipping fee incurred by the seller for orders fulfilled by TikTok (FBT). This is part of `actual_shipping_fee_amount`.
Applicable only for EU and UK. |
^^^^fbt_fulfillment_fee_amount |string |-30 |The shipping and warehouse fulfillment fee incurred by the seller for orders fulfilled by TikTok (FBT). This is part of `actual_shipping_fee_amount`.
Applicable only for the US. |
^^^^fbt_fulfillment_fee_reimbursement_amount |string |5 |(**Deprecated**: This field is deprecated and will return an empty string. Please refer to `shipping_cost_breakdown.fbt_fulfillment_fee_reimbursement_amount` instead for the relevant details.) |
^^^^return_refund_subsidy_amount |string |5 |For shipping fee from returns and refunds, you pay up to a standard rate, and TikTok Shop covers the remaining amount.This is part of `customer_paid_shipping_fee_amount`. |
^^^^refunded_customer_shipping_fee_amount |string |5 |Shipping fee returned to customers due returns and refunds.Does not include subsidies.This is part of `customer_paid_shipping_fee_amount`. |
^^^^customer_shipping_fee |string |5 |The shipping fee borne by the customer.This is part of `customer_paid_shipping_fee_amount`. |
^^^^refund_customer_shipping_fee |string |1 |Refund the shipping fee borne by the customer. Include subsidies.This is part of `customer_paid_shipping_fee_amount`. |
^^fee_tax_amount |string |-30 |The total fees and taxes charged by TikTok Shop at the time of order settlement. Shipping-related costs are excluded. This is equivalent to the sum of all contributory amounts in `fee_tax_breakdown`. |
^^fee_tax_breakdown |object | |The list of amounts that directly contribute to `fee_tax_amount`. |
^^^fee |object | |The list of fees. |
^^^^platform_commission_amount |string |20 |The commission amount charged by the platform. |
^^^^referral_fee_amount |string |11 |The referral fee charged for processing successful orders.
Applicable only for the US. |
^^^^refund_administration_fee_amount |string |10 |The 20% refund administration fee deducted from the total refunded referral fee amount. |
^^^^transaction_fee_amount |string |0 |The transaction fee charged for processing successful orders. |
^^^^credit_card_handling_fee_amount |string |0 |The handling fee charged when the buyer pays with a credit card. |
^^^^affiliate_commission_amount |string |5 |The commission amount charged to the seller for payment to the creator. |
^^^^affiliate_commission_amount_before_pit |string |3 |The affiliate ads commission paid to a creator before any personal income tax withholding.
Applicable only for SEA markets. |
^^^^affiliate_partner_commission_amount |string |12 |The commission amount for purchases through affiliate partner links. |
^^^^affiliate_ads_commission_amount |string |10 |The commission for eligible orders from ads. |
^^^^sfp_service_fee_amount |string |5 |The service fee charged for participation in the [Seller Free Shipping Programme]. |
^^^^live_specials_fee_amount |string |4 |The service fee charged for participation in the [LIVE Specials Programme]. |
^^^^bonus_cashback_service_fee_amount |string |2 |The service fee charged for participation in the bonus cashback program. |
^^^^mall_service_fee_amount |string |12 |The service fee charged for using TikTok Shop Mall. |
^^^^voucher_xtra_service_fee_amount |string |10 |The service fee charged for participation in the Voucher Xtra program. |
^^^^flash_sales_service_fee_amount |string |12 |The service fee charged for participation in flash sales. |
^^^^cofunded_promotion_service_fee_amount |string |4 |The service fee charged for co-funded promotions. |
^^^^pre_order_service_fee_amount |string |10 |The service fee charged for participation in the pre-order program. |
^^^^tsp_commission_amount |string |10 |The commission amount charged by TikTok Shop Partners (TSP). |
^^^^dt_handling_fee_amount |string |10 |The handling fee charged for orders that are fulfilled by Dilayani Tokopedia. |
^^^^epr_pob_service_fee_amount |string |10 |The eco-contributions TikTok Shop pays on your behalf to the qualified producer responsibility organization (PRO). |
^^^^seller_paylater_handling_fee_amount |string |-10 |The handling fee charged to the seller for participation in the PayLater program. |
^^^^fee_per_item_sold_amount |string |0 |The fee charged to sellers by the platform for each item sold. This is equivalent to the sum of all per-item fees for all SKUs in the order.
Applicable only for the Brazil market. |
^^^^cofunded_creator_bonus_amount |string |-10 |The portion of the creator bonus that you co-fund as part of the commission boost campaign. |
^^^^dynamic_commission_amount |string |5 |The dynamic commission fee is the amount that the platform charges to all sellers for every successfully delivered order.
Applicable only for Indonesia. |
^^^^external_affiliate_marketing_fee_amount |string |10 |The service fee for participating in the External Affiliate Marketing Solution Program, as stated during registration. |
^^^^vn_fix_infrastructure_fee |string |0 |Infrastructure fees are a fixed service fee that TikTok Shop charges for providing, maintaining, and developing infrastructure for delivery services. It applies to delivered orders on the main order level. |
^^^^affiliate_commission_deposit |string |0 |The amount reserved for creator commissions after an order is paid. Applies only to commissions tied to order volume and is based on the highest earning rate. |
^^^^affiliate_commission_release |string |0 |The commission deposit refunded to you after order settlement. Applies only to commissions tied to order volume. |
^^^^tap_shop_ads_commission |string |0 |The advertising commission cost a merchant pays to TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner (TAP). |
^^^^shipping_fee_guarantee_service_fee |string |0 |A flat service fee charged for each order under the Shipping Fee Guarantee Program |
^^^^installation_service_fee |string |0 |The fee TikTok Shop charges you for using platform installation service |
^^^^campaign_resource_fee |string |0 |Amount of campaign resource fee from program seller joining in
|
^^^tax |object | |The list of tax amounts. |
^^^^vat_amount |string |30 |The VAT paid by the platform on the seller's behalf.
Applicable only for cross-border shop orders. |
^^^^import_vat_amount |string |10 |The import VAT, a tax paid on goods bought in one country and imported into another.
Applicable only for cross-border shop orders. In Japan, it refers to the Japan Consumption Tax (JCT). |
^^^^customs_duty_amount |string |5 |The customs duties, a type of tax on cross-border goods collected by governments.
Applicable only for cross-border shop orders. |
^^^^customs_clearance_amount |string |4 |The fees charged by logistic suppliers for customs clearance services.
Applicable only for cross-border shop orders. |
^^^^sst_amount |string |3 |The sales and service tax (SST) collected and remitted to the tax authority by the platform for low-value goods imported into Malaysia, effective January 1, 2024. |
^^^^gst_amount |string |1 |The goods and services tax (GST) collected and remitted to the tax authority by the platform for low-value goods imported into Singapore, effective January 1, 2023. |
^^^^iva_amount |string |5 |The Mexican VAT that TikTok Shop is required to withhold on your taxable products and remit to the tax authority. |
^^^^isr_amount |string |5 |The Mexican federal income tax that TikTok Shop is required to withhold. |
^^^^anti_dumping_duty_amount |string |10 |The anti-dumping duties collected by governments for import goods. |
^^^^local_vat_amount |string |10 |The VAT paid by the platform on the seller's behalf. Applicable only for local shop orders. |
^^^^pit_amount |string |10 |The personal income tax (PIT) paid by the platform on the seller's behalf. |
^^supplementary_component |object | |Supplementary costs for your reference. These amounts do not directly contribute to the settlement amount. |
^^^customer_payment_amount |string |0 |The total amount paid by the customer. |
^^^customer_refund_amount |string |0 |The exact amount refunded to the customer. |
^^^platform_discount_amount |string |10 |The discounts funded by the platform, such as coupons and campaign discounts. |
^^^platform_discount_refund_amount |string |1 |The platform discounts to be reversed (and deducted from the final settlement) if the order was refunded as a result of the seller's responsibility. |
^^^seller_cofunded_discount_amount |string |44 |The seller's portion of a co-funded voucher discount in co-funding campaigns. |
^^^seller_cofunded_discount_refund_amount |string |23 |The seller's portion of a co-funded voucher discount in co-funding campaigns that was refunded to the seller. |
^^^platform_cofunded_discount_amount |string |11 |The platform's portion of a co-funded voucher discount in co-funding campaigns. |
^^^platform_cofunded_discount_refund_amount |string |10 |The platform's portion of a co-funded voucher discount in co-funding campaigns that was refunded to the platform. |
^^^retail_delivery_fee_amount |string |-1 |The final retail delivery fee for deliveries in Colorado, US. For more information, see [Colorado Retail Delivery Fee FAQ](https://seller-us.tiktok.com/university/essay?knowledge_id=2459780628350762&default_language=en&identity=1).
Formula: retail_delivery_fee_payment + retail_delivery_fee_refund |
^^^retail_delivery_fee_payment_amount |string |4 |The retail delivery fee for deliveries in Colorado, US. For more information, see [Colorado Retail Delivery Fee FAQ](https://seller-us.tiktok.com/university/essay?knowledge_id=2459780628350762&default_language=en&identity=1). |
^^^retail_delivery_fee_refund_amount |string |2 |The retail delivery fee subsidy by the platform for losses due to returns, refunds, or other issues in Colorado, US. |
^^^sales_tax_amount |string |10 |The final sales tax to be paid by the customer for the product and delivery.
Formula: sales_tax_payment_amount - sales_tax_refund_amount |
^^^sales_tax_payment_amount |string |0 |The expected sales tax to be paid by the customer for the product and delivery. |
^^^sales_tax_refund_amount |string |0 |The sales tax amount returned to the customer in the event of a refund. |
^^reserve_id |string |56789910 |The ID of a reserve transaction. |
^^reserve_amount |string |100 |The amount withheld from settlement based on TikTok Shop Reserve Policy. Refer to TikTok Shop Academy for more information.

* A positive amount indicates funds that have been released.
* A negative amount indicates funds being withheld from the settlement. |
   ^^associated_order_id |string |78217892102382101 |The order ID associated with the reserve transaction. |
   ^^reserve_status |string |Collected |The status of the reserve funds.
   Possible values:
* COLLECTED: A portion of the order's settlement amount has been withheld as reserve funds.
* RELEASED: The previously reserved funds have been released and paid out to the seller. |
   ^^estimated_release_time |string |1685548800 |The estimated date when the reserve funds will be released and paid out to the seller. Unix timestamp.
   Returns an empty value if the reserve funds have already been released. |
